case.state: Please, Nintendo. Just re-release Golden Sun on the e-shop. It doesn't have to be anything new. Just acknowledge my game in some way.
At least Sakurai remembered to put me into Smash Ultimate... as a spirit.
Wow. You weren't kidding when you said this was a hot spring. And it's so... steamy...
It's so warm out here... If we're going to play cards and take our clothes off, can we get started already?
Sheesh, it's scorching out here. Can we get started? The sooner we get out of our clothes, the better...
Only the Lamakan Desert was as hot as it is here... Can we get started already? I want to get out of these robes.
So we're here to play cards... and get out of our clothes? I can handle this.
Hi! We're here to play cards, right? Let's get started, then!
I can't say I'm too familiar with this game, but the rules seem simple enough.
Well... The more the merrier, and all. But it's starting to feel a little crowded!
Well, the more the merrier!
Ah... Thank you for reminding everyone, Fina. I think everyone appreciates that.
I know my hair isn't exactly green, ~player~, but I hope I'm good enough for you all the same.
Finally, we can get started. This heat is really getting to me.
We can start, then? Good. I'm sweating already from the heat...
What's a little strip poker between friends?
Well, we've known each other for long enough that I'm sure we can play something like this together with no problems.

Let us do our best to keep this place free of sin, as we--
Who am I fooling? We're going to get naked together. Aren't we, ~cleric.ifMale(brother|sister)~ ~cleric~?
I've never played strip poker before, but don't go easy on me! I'll be doing my best, so you should do yours.
Don't go easy on me just because I've never played strip poker before, okay? I'll be doing my best.
I'd been hoping for a chance to get away from it all, even for a little while. Let's have a good game, okay?
If you were hoping that I'd be easy to strip, you'll find yourself mistaken. I'll be doing my best to~background.time~.
Mia is wearing a swimsuit as an undergarment. This line makes sure she doesn't treat this as a surprise if someone else is wearing a swimsuit.
No exchanges, thank you.
I don't need to exchange any.
I'll swap one card... no. On second thought, I won't swap any.
Lucky me! I don't need to swap any.
Oh, that's lucky! I don't need to swap any of these!
Oh, I've already got... Aha. I don't need to swap my cards.
Could I swap all of these? Thank you.
May I swap all of my cards? Thank you!
Hmm. I don't see any of these working. I'll swap all of them.
May I swap all of my cards? I'm really struggling here.
I don't think this is working for me at all. Can I swap all five?
I'll swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Please, let me swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I think I can work with this. I just need to swap I'll swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I can maybe make this work...
Would it be wrong to pray for a better hand?
Let's see how far this gets me.
This isn't exactly going to make waves, but...
I'll swap out ~cards.text~.
~Cards.Text~.
~Cards.Text~, please.
I think I'll swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Oh please, let me swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I can definitely work with this. I just need to swap I'll swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I'm not exactly sure what the odds are.
I think I can make this work!
Just another learning experience.
~Cards.Text~, if you please.
Uhm... ~Cards.Text~?
I'll swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Please, let me swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I think I can work with this. I just need to swap I'll swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Okay... Yeah, I think that'll do.
Aha! That's what I need to do.
Oh dear... Maybe I can save my chances here?
I'd better swap ~cards.text~.
~Cards.Text~...
What do you think, Fizz?
Hmm... I'm not too sure. What do you think, Fizz?
Tee hee!I think I'm about to take the lead.
Oh no, my cards are terrible. Terribly good, that is. Sorry, ~opp~.
Well, my cards are rather good. How about yours, ~opp~?
Aha! I think I'm about to turn this around.
I hope you enjoyed being in the lead, ~opp~, because things are about to change.
Count your blessings while you can, ~opp~. I think I'm about to get a leg up on you!
Thinking about it, I've been in far more dangerous situations than this, I'll survive.
I can afford to take another hit. A good skill to master is knowing when you need to go on the offensive, and when you need to defend.
I only have a small advantage here, but hopefully it'll be enough.
Luck has really been on my side to~background.time~, and I think this round will be no different.
Well? Go ahead, ~opp~. Tell us what you got.
My, my. I think this is another loss for you, ~opp~. Or did you have better luck than me?
Okay, so now that we know for certain how the game works, we can get right into things!
Oh, this is going rather well for me!
Let's see... I think I've got the hang of it.
I hope nobody comes away from this feeling let down. I know I won't.
It's not about winning, is it? It's about having a good time.
Keep your chin up if things aren't going your way.Things can always turn around.
I'm getting the hang of things pretty quickly, aren't I?
I don't think I'll be losing. Not with this hand!
Ah, thank the stars. I'm safe for now.
Ah! That was a good call.
If you were expecting me to lose yet again, you'll have to wait a minute.
That's more like it. I'm glad I focused my efforts.
You won't catch me unprepared this time!
As one of the Mercury Clan's few remaining descendants, I promise to do my clan proud.
Everything about this is a new learning experience!
Aha! By Mercury, I've got a good couple of cards this time.
As long as we're all enjoying ourselves, I'd call this a success.
Now that Mercury Lighthouse has been lit again, I wonder how my village will fare with the added attention?
Hmm, hmm, hmm!~

A bad mood can be cured by good, wholesome fun.
Though this isn't all that wholesome...
Mercury is represented by the humble fish, but Jupiter is represented by birds. Don't birds eat fish? Hm.
Things are looking nice and clear for me!
Oh, dear. I didn't know I'd be doing this well. It's really not even between us now.
Sorry, ~opp~, but I think the distance between us is about to get bigger.
How lucky do you feel, ~opp~? Tee hee!
I must've eaten a lucky pepper lately, because things are really starting to go my way to~background.time~.
We're dueling each other at this point, so... let's make it count, right?
Hmm... Who will be the one to strip? ~Opp~, or myself?
Hehe... I think I'm about to get rid of this little difference between us.
Don't count your chickens before they hatch, ~opp~. I may be about to change things.
Okay, so now that we know for certain how the game works... We're all clear to keep going, right?
This could be better. Right now, my cards just seem to be okay...
There's nothing wrong with being average!
Do they accept Game Tickets here? I feel like I should've paid something to enter.
Oh, so all I've got is... ~self.hand~? Hmm.
I was beginning to lose faith in my cards. This is all I can hope for right now.
The most important thing is that nobody feels hurt by losing.
Not exactly a miss, but not exactly a successful strike, either.
This is all part of the plan! At least, I believe it so.
Could be better, could be worse.
I-I don't have much to say about this. Sorry.
Ah haha... Yeah, this should've gone better.
I know my lack of shame at a game like this must seem odd for a healer like me. However, saving the entire world from destruction gave me a new perspective on things.
I need to be careful... I don't want to lose my cool!
Oh, I just remembered something. I think Fizz was hiding in my cape. I hope that little Djinni doesn't feel bad.
Huh, I just remembered something. Fizz was hiding in my cape... I hope that little Djinni doesn't feel bad about me taking it off.
This is getting tense. I can't decide if I really want to win or not, which doesn't help matters.
I don't get it, why do I want to win so badly? Maybe just to show you up, ~opp~? But I'm not angry at you, don't get me wrong. I... forget it.
I really don't understand this game sometimes. I'm still doing poorly -- compared to ~opp~, at least.
Oh... shoot. Well, I'm done for.
Hmm. I might fall behind soon.
Ah, darn. I might lose this time. It's your lucky break, ~opp~.
Hmm... I'm not so sure about this one. Maybe you'll win this one, ~opp~.
I think there is a decent chance the gap between us will close this round, ~opp~. I didn't get that good of a hand.
Not bad! Now that we know for certain how the game works... Oh dear. I've gotten a bad set of cards this time...
Really giving me the cold shoulder, aren't you?
You know what they say. The night is darkest right before the dawn breaks.
After a long journey across all of Weyard, I really started to miss the comforts of home.
Oh, I just realized that I never tried any of the cooking in Prox. I guess I've missed my chance.
Wait, no, I read my hand wrong! I should've swapped some...
Oh, drat. I should've swapped some cards after all. I think I misread what I have.
I-I totally didn't leave myself with a bad hand on purpose because I want to lose! Tee hee...
Well, swapping all of them didn't help me in the slightest.
I thought I'd at least get something good if I swapped all of them...
Even if I lose a little bit, I won't regret a single moment of this.
I mustn't give up in the face of adversity... or bad cards.
I've been to the edge of the world and back. I'll come back from this, too.
Oh. I just got chills up my spine remembering Crossbone Isle. That was a rough time all around.
Hm... Not that good.
Well, I didn't get anything good this time. How about the rest of you?
It's easy to believe that I've never played this kind of game before, isn't it?
I'm having trouble focusing. Can't imagine why.
This might be it for me, haha...
Oh, dear. I didn't expect to go down quite this soon.
Aha... Yeah, I'm probably done for.
Luck just doesn't seem to be on my side right now...
It becomes awfully difficult to keep up this chit-chat while in such a state of undress.
Of course, Barbara. I'll use this as a chance to honor Mercury, if that's alright.
I'd be happy to join you, Barbara. I may use this as a chance to honor Mercury, if that's okay.
If you go far enough, Dunban, you'll just fall off the edge of the world. There's no coming back from that.
I was looking to settle down and raise a family of my own. Oh, I've even put thought into what I'd call my children, tee hee! I was thinking... Nowell, for a girl, and Rief, for a boy.
To have babies...? I've always wondered what I would call my children of my own. I was thinking of naming my daughter Nowell, or my son Rief. Maybe I could have both, tee hee!
Wait, you already took something off! Using Growth like that is cheating!
Hey! Using Growth like that is... well it's blatant cheating!

state.text: Mia used Pure Wish!
Mia used Ply!
Mia used Wish!
Mia used Wish Well!

case.state: If I were allowed to bring something back with me to Weyard, I'd bring a `washing machine' with me. Beating the dirt out of clothes gets tiring.
I've actually been to the ends of the ocean -- the very edge of the world itself. Every time I'm at the beach, I reminisce about that journey.
One moment. I'm going to cool myself down... Curse this heat.
Sheesh... If I don't get out of this heat or my clothes soon, I'm going to shrivel up and blow away.
And here I thought Saturos and Menardi were weird...
Where do these weirdoes come from...?

If an undead visited a sanctum, could they restore your life?
Hm. I have a feeling they would just banish your spirit to the afterlife. Never mind.

state.text: Girls, please, be honest... it's not too big, is it? I can't get a good look at myself from behind, so...
Ladies, please, be honest with me. It's... not too big, is it? My behind. I can't really judge for myself.
So... {small}If you're going to sneak some glances my way, ~player~, I suppose I may as well give you a look from another angle...
You've been looking my way all game, ~player~. Have you seen me from this angle?

case.state: ... ~Creep~, do you mind?
~Creep~, please don't get any closer to me.
(Why do I have to stand next to ~creep~? They're freaking me out. Ew.)

state.text: It's as they say... "If you can't beat them, join them." H-How do I look?
I-I'm starting to feel like I'd stand out even more if I didn't give you all a look at my... uhm.. {small}see for yourself.{!reset}

case.state: Sheesh. I need a drink. Not because I want to get drunk -- the heat is just getting to me again.
The Djinn make great allies in combat. They passively boost our strength when they're set, and when we need them to use their power, they can combine to form great summons!
The Djinn are some of our greatest strengths in a fight. They boost our power when they are set to us, and then they can channel their power together to unleash powerful summons!
They're still going at it...
How shameless of them, doing that sort of thing together...
A boy and a girl, doing that in front of others... shameless!
The two of them are... Eep...!
Being surrounded by so much bare skin, I'm starting to feel like the odd one out...
Speaking of Game Tickets, it's been a while since we visited Tolbi. I never really cared for the Lucky Wheels, but I did enjoy the Lucky Medal fountain.
My task of guarding Mercury Lighthouse didn't end just because it was lit. I still have to make sure the cultural heritage of my people is left intact... and un-plundered.
Psynergy test
Psynergy test
Look at him go!
There are a few types of Psynergy that can interact with objects like cranks or ropes. I suppose, if one was clever enough, you could make a Psynergy-powered device...
I'm no engineer, but a few types of Psynergy that can interact with objects -- ropes, pulleys, cranks. I'm sure if you were smart enough, you could make a Psynergy-powered device.
You hardly know the half of it, Jura. I've had to keep my friends alive with some very close calls.
Believe me, Jura, I'm glad for it as well. I've had some very close calls in keeping my friends alive in battle.
It's not like we're keeping Psynergy itself a secret. You have to be born as an Adept, you can't become one later in life, as far as I'm aware.
He's not really trained, because he's not a pet. The Djinn are powerful elemental spirits that just so happen to be on our side.

state.text: Gloria, I'm... not going to do that.

case.state: Well, aside from a certain relative of mine, there are my two students. Other than that... I think I'm one of the only descendants of Mercury left.
Yes. I'm what's known as an Adept, meaning that I can use the powers of Psynergy to manipulate the elements.

state.text: Another loss? Oh... fiddlesticks. Fizz, I hate to be a bother, but I think you should go explore for a bit. You don't need to see what happens next.
Twice in a row? Ah... Fizz, I hate to be a bother, but I think you should go explore for a bit. You don't need to see what happens next.
Fizz, I hate to be a bother, but I think you should go explore for a bit. You don't need to see what happens next.

case.state: Thank Mercury, I was starting to wonder if I'd ever lose. This heat is killing me.
Oh, thank the stars. I was beginning to think I'd never get a chance to take anything off in this weather.
Ah! Looks like I'm the first one to lose. Oh, well! It's better to get things started, right?
Seems like I'm the first one out. Oh well! Better to get things started, right?
My first loss? I was starting to think I'd have a flawless game, given how things were going.
Okay, I swear I actually tried to win that time.
... Again? Really?
... If Fizz were here, I'd tell him to leave before he learns some mean words from me.
One minor mistake and I just start losing left and right, huh?
I-I was just a little distracted, that's all! Oh... I'd better not lose again, that would be embarrassing.
Three times back-to-back? Oh... Well, fine. It's not a problem.
I know it's not about winning, but...

I didn't mean to do that...!
That means it's my turn again, huh.
Twice in a row? Hm. Okay, that does it for my dress, then.
One loss after another, then. No matter. I'm not out of the running quite yet.
Ah... Two in a row, and right at the end of my tether. Darn.
Whoops! I'll need to be more careful, or I might lose a third time!
My first loss? That's not a problem. I wasn't expecting to win flawlessly.
Whoops! Another loss for me, looks like.
Ah, my turn again? Not a problem. It's not like I'm out of options yet!
Oh! If I lost, that means I get to take off this dress of mine. Well... there is one upside to that.
Oh, I lost? Well, I can finally get out of this dress of mine, and show you something special.
I knew this was going to happen sooner or later... that doesn't make it less embarrassing for me.
I'm cutting things a little close, aren't I? Well, I signed up for this... I'll just have to do it!
I bought myself some time by baring my breasts for you all... now I need to see things through to the end.
Oh, thank goodness. I'm starting to get tired from all this heat...
Thank goodness. I'm getting drenched in sweat thanks to all this heat...
Well, the Djinn empower us just by being set upon our person. If we need to, we can unleash their energy individually. Fizz, for example, can heal someone of their injuries.
Because these summons could destroy or heavily injure anything or anyone nearby. I can't overstate how powerful these summons are -- they could level entire towns!
That's right. Although, now that the lighthouses have been lit, things are changing for me. Instead of keeping people out to stop it from being lit, I need to make sure it stays lit...
Well, most Adepts are born with the power. However, there are a few cases where a sudden, direct impact of a Psynergy Stone to the head has unlocked the potential.
It's really hot ~background.if.indoors(in|out)~ here, so I'm looking forward to getting out of this gear. Starting with my padded gloves...
These gloves of mine are so comfortable, I sometimes forget I'm wearing them. At least, whenever I'm not somewhere super warm.
My home village is in a very cold place, so we dress to match. These boots are really thick and sturdy, which really helped given how much traveling I had to do on foot.
I never really took the time to get a new outfit, and I didn't want to just leave my cape somewhere, you know?
I never had anywhere to put my cape when we were traveling, so I just always wore it. It never weighed me down.
It's really cold up in Imil, so we dress in these thick layers. It's not so good for traveling in the desert. But underneath that...
This dress did me no favors when we were traveling through the Lamakan Desert. Back in Imil, we dress in thick layers to insulate ourselves from the cold. Underneath, however...
I'll only lower the top part for now. I can't go showing you all of my privates in one go, now, can I?
I'll only pull the top down for now, if that's alright. You can wait a little longer to see the rest, okay?
Hard to believe I've gotten this far... Just a little bit more, and you'll see everything...
Gosh, I'm really doing this...? Just a little bit more, and you'll be able to see... everything...
And then, when they have used their power and are in a standby state, they can use their energy in tandem to transform into mighty summons, capable of vanquishing any foe!
My tits appreciate the compliment. I do not know what this Dynamax is, but it sounds like a big deal.
I don't believe it needs to be the forehead, but that's what happened in the matter I can recall. A girl named Feizhi became a Jupiter Adept through such an event.

Actually, come to think of it I also have my hair ties. Should I take them off?
Actually, I won't. Maybe some other time.
There. Now all us girls are even, right? It was a little bit tight around my chest, anyway.
Phew... There we go, now we're even. It was actually a little bit tight, you know. It feels good to let the girls loose, doesn't it?
Fweh... This thing is actually pretty tight on my chest. It feels good to let them out.
Phew... There we go. It was actually a little bit tight, you know. It feels good to let them loose.
It's bad enough that I had to travel with all the boys during our quest, now I can't even strip down without them being around...

state.text: Oh, look. I had Fizz back there and nearly forgot. Sorry, Fizz! The elemental Djinn have helped my friends and I out in battle many times.
Oh! Fizz, you were hiding in there? Sorry, I forgot about you. He's a Mercury Djinni. The Djinn have helped myself and my friends in battle countless times.
Oh! I'm sorry Fizz. I forgot you were hiding back there. Everyone, this is Fizz, a Mercury Djinni. The elemental Djinn have helped my friends and I out in battle many times.

case.state: Those gloves don't get in the way of my Psynergy, either. So they're good to have.
Gloves are practically necessary if you want to do anything outdoors in Imil. You don't want to catch frostbite, that's for sure.
In fact, Imil is far to the north of Angara. As the only healer left, dealing with the epidemics that break out in winter is tough to do by myself.
Imil is very far north, and dealing with epidemics as the only healer was tough business. I had two students, actually. I hope they're managing things while I'm away.
Imil is far to the north, and a few days' travel from any other settlements. I was the only healer most winters, and dealing with colds that spread about was tough to manage alone.
I must say, getting to travel across all of Weyard, while difficult, was a once in a lifetime journey that I'm glad I embarked on!
Oh, and this is the traditional undergarment for the Mercury Clan. It's a design we've been wearing for generations now.
What do you think? This is the traditional undergarment style for Mercury Clan. It's great for relaxing in the water with!
So... What do you think? This underclothing design is one the Mercury Clan has been wearing for ages. Don't I look good in it?
I feel so exposed like this... I'm really baring it all for you, aren't I?
Gosh, I feel so exposed like this... I'm really baring it all.
I-I hope the people of Imil never hear about this. Don't get me wrong, I'm having a good time. B-But I don't want them to know that their `angel' is doing a thing like this...
Fweh... This thing is actually pretty tight on my chest. It feels good to let them out.
Phew... There we go. It was actually a little bit tight, you know. It feels good to let them loose.
Try not to stare so much, boys. You'll make me blush!
Okay, boys. Try not to stare at me that much. I'll lose my composure...
I hope my presence here isn't distracting to you at all, Yuno...
Do things at whatever speed you like, ~name~.
I'll always cherish the memory of this moment.
It appears that ~name~ was the unlucky one.
Don't worry. You'll feel better once you've gotten this over with.
Hope you aren't too eager to lose...
It's just a game, let's not start taking this too seriously.
Good, ~target~ lost. Hehe...
I've been hoping to see more of you.
Oh, I won! Well, more accurately, ~target~ lost...
All eyes are now fixed on you, ~target~. I hope you don't feel pressured.
I've done my fair share of stripping -- now you do yours.
Goodness, is it your turn already, ~target~?
I've been waiting for... well, not very long at all.
Your turn, ~target~?
You've lasted this long, so one little loss isn't too disappointing, right?
W-Well... Go on...
F-Forgive me...
Gah... I'm so exposed like this, right in front of ~target~...
What can I say? I'm still looking forward to this.
Take all the time you need. I'm not going anywhere.
I've been enjoying myself all ~background.time~. Help me keep that up, alright?
You're doing just fine, ~target~. Just fine indeed.
Mercury, ruler of the seas, healer of all things. Keep us well, and cleanse us of our troubles.
Oh, Mercury, rules of the seas and healer of all things. Keep us all well, and cleanse us of our troubles.
Mercury, great star of the seas, and healer of all. Keep us in good health, and cleanse us of all that ails us.
Have you ever met any Venus Djinn on your travels, Toph? They're little spirits with power over earth and plants. Like Fizz here!
It's nice to meet another adept with the powers of water. Though, I suppose your power may not be Psynergy...?
It's wonderful to meet another adept with control of water, Barbara. Though, I suppose your power isn't actually Psynergy!
~Target~, I have to question this claim of yours of being a goddess. Are you perhaps some kind of avatar for Mercury? Is that what you mean?
If you don't mind answering a question I'm sure you've been asked many times before, how exactly is it that you see, Toph?
Have you ever met any Venus Djinn on your travels, Toph? They're little spirits with power over earth and plants.
You called yourself the founder of Alchemy? In my world, Alchemy's power is devastating, but necessary for the world itself to function...
Take things one step at a time, ~target~.
If you need a little longer to get ready, then please, take your time.
I'll remember this moment fondly.
Show us how it's done.
Seems that ~name~ was the unlucky one.
Don't worry. You'll feel better once you've gotten this over with.
Yay! I mean... Oh no, ~name~ has to strip...
Well, it's a little unfortunate, but you knew what was coming.
Good, ~target~ lost. Hehe...
I've been hoping to see more of you.
I'm used to supporting others. You may have my encouragement, ~target~!
Mercury has blessed me for another turn!
I'm just sitting here... waiting...
W-Well... Go on...
S-Sorry... I'm losing focus...
Don't play coy, ~target~. You've seen enough of me already. Let's see some of you.
I'm right here to support you!
I've never felt such attraction to other ladies before... What a wonderful new experience.
I think my heart just leapt a bit. I'm excited to see your move, ~target~!
I was kind of hoping you would lose... j-just so that you felt involved, of course!
I've never been near to another woman in this kind of situation before. It's all so new to me.
Blessings of Mercury upon you, ~target~.
Go for a good one, ~target~!
If you ever wanted somewhere to recuperate in peace, you're always welcome to visit Imil.
Oh, a tie. How unusual. I didn't even think that was possible!
Oh, look! It's a tie, isn't it? That seems like a rare thing.
Oh! A tie! That's a rare find, isn't it?
My, my. That's not the only small thing you're showing off for us...
It's funny how long a moment like this can feel.
Is that all you're planning to show for us?
I'm finding it a little troublesome to stay casual about this whole thing.
The freedom to choose whatever you like is quite liberating, isn't it?
Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ a good choice. I'd go with ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ as well.
The sacrifice of your ~clothing~ will not be in vain.
~clothing.ifPlural(They are|It's a)~ pretty good-looking. Especially when you're wearing ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~.
Don't be afraid to take a little risk, ~name~.
There's no problem with this.
We'll get through to you, slowly but surely.
There's no sense in giving up if you still have a chance to turn things around.
How much did you get your ~clothing~ for? ~clothing.ifPlural(Are they|Was it)~ expensive at all?
Oh, Mercury, save me from my wild throes of passion for his lack of ~clothing~.
I was hoping for... never mind.
Forgive me if I don't start jumping for joy.
Moving right along...
I see, I see...
A small wave, but a sign of things to come later on.
Just a little drop compared to everything else...
You'll survive without ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it.)~
This whole thing is a little silly, isn't it?
One down, and a little more to go, hee hee!
Not making much of a splash, but I'm not one who can complain.
It's funny how long a moment like this can feel.
Is that all you're planning to show for us?
I'm finding it a little troublesome to stay casual about this whole thing.
The freedom to choose whatever you like is quite liberating, isn't it?
The sacrifice of your ~clothing~ will not be for nothing.
Seeing how so many different cultures of the world dress was a fun bit of learning during my travels.
The sacrifice of your ~clothing~ will not be in vain.
Dressed to impress, aren't we, ~target~?
The sacrifice of your ~clothing~ will not be in vain.
Hmm... I don't see any problems here.
We'll get through to you, slowly but surely.
This is all quite a silly thing to worry about, isn't it?
I think I'd quite like to have something like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~. It would be a good way to switch up my style.
Oh... If you need a replacement staff, I believe I may know someone who can get you an Ankh. He's a weapon vendor in Tolbi.
Oh dear. The weapon vendor in Tolbi was selling an Angelic Ankh, if you want a replacement for your staff.
Oh, Mercury, save me from my overwhelming excitement for her absence of ~clothing~.
Maybe next round we can see something exciting.
I'm not exactly going to start cheering, but, thank you for that.
I'm certain you can handle something as diminutive as this.
Even without your ~clothing~, you may yet come out on top.
I still think you have a fair chance of winning, if you play your cards right.
The ripples of your decision will carry on through the rest of your ~background.time~ here.
Hee hee. This just means that when you lose again, ~target~, it'll be even more exciting for the rest of us!
Oh, you look so precious without ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~!
Little by little, we'll see more of what you're really all about.
Just your ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~, huh?
No need to rub it in...
Alright, whatever you want to do is fine...
Is it wrong for me to be a little disappointed?
Letting your guard down, ~target~? Hee hee...
It's been really good to have somewhere to relax. Between saving the world and being the village's only healer, it's been nothing but busywork for me for... years now.
I hope you don't feel ~background.if.hot(too warm|too cold)~ ~background.if.indoors(in|out)~ here...
Hopefully taking your ~clothing~ off will help you find comfort.
March forwards with determination, ~target~!
I hope you aren't feeling nervious. We're all friends here, right?
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ looks pretty stylish! I think. Actually, I'm not too sure.
I've not seen anything like it back in Imil. We went in our own direction when it comes to fashion.
Hardly surprising at this point, really. You're barely covered up as-is.
It's hard-- I mean, it's difficult to look anywhere else, regardless.
Well... you may as well keep going. You're hardly keeping anything secret at this point.
If you want to make things up to me, I wouldn't mind~
Hmpf.
Well, if ~clothing.ifPluralthose are all|that's everything)~, then...
Don't worry, ~target~. I'll support you from here.
GreatI look forward to seeing the rest of you.
I haven't seen many men with a style quite like yours... Is it a style? I can't quite tell.
Don't rush head-first into danger. If you do that, someone else will have to get you out of trouble.
I'll remember seeing you take off your ~clothing~. Trust me, I'll remember.
Don't count your blessings before the day is done, ~target~.
I'll support you a little from over here... but only a little bit, hee hee!
I'm not against winning another round or two...
Do whatever makes you feel most comfortable. That's what matters in my mind.
~clothing.ifPlural(They are|It's a)~ very nice ~clothing~. ~clothing.ifPlyral(They|It)~ suits you well.
Honestly, I think I'd take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off, too.
I'll reminisce about all the time I spent looking for new gear... It was nice to go out shopping now and again.
Do whatever you feel most comfortable doing.
~clothing.ifPlural(They are|It's a)~ very nice ~clothing~. ~clothing.ifPlural(They|it)~ completes your look, so it's a bit sad to see ~clothing.ifPlural(them|go)~.
You looked good with ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~. Your outfit looked complete.
Hopefully taking your ~clothing~ off will let you feel a bit more comfortable...
Move forwards with a determined attitude, ~target~!
Hmm hmm! Do whatever makes you happy.
This'll make a splash, for sure.
That's... That's not underwear at all. Those are bandaids, right?
A Keyblade, you say? Well, it certainly looks impressive. Do they all look like that?
... Sorry, I didn't mean to stare!
It's getting rather difficult to concentrate. You look rather charming, ~target~. All of you that we can see.
I hardly know where to keep my eyes at this point.
We're all going to get out of our things, one way or another...
I... see. Well, if that's how it has to be.
I feel quite exposed here, and I was hoping... never mind.
I'll support you, ~target~. I've got your back.
I look forward to seeing the rest of you. You're doing great!
I quite like your outfit, as a whole. It's a style I haven't really seen before.
There's no need to rush head-first into things. That'll only lead to you getting hurt.
The only real way to move forward, is to march onwards with determination to your goal.
I'm going to give this everything I've got! It wouldn't be fair to you otherwise.
Nicely done! I'll try and support you as best I can.
I'll try and keep pace with you, ~target~. It'll make the game more interesting.
So soon? Goodness, we barely know each other!
Wait, ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~? Already? But we just began!
I was kind of hoping you'd take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off at some point.... hehe...
This one is going to make a splash, I can tell...
Goodness, you're taking ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off already?
We're really getting into the spirit of things now!
You know, as a healer, I did have to study human anatomy pretty wlll...
Goodness, is it that time already? Let's see what you're made of.
I'm getting chills already!
I never would have had the confidence to say this just a little while ago, but... you look very handsome, ~target~!
Remember that you can Retreat if you don't feel like you can handle the game! Haha...
This is a good look for you... things are starting to get heated, aren't they?
How do you feel? Good? Well, do you still think you can win? Hehe!
Goodness, are you sure you want to take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ off already?
W-Wait, we only just started. Are you sure about taking off your ~clothing~ right away? Think it through!
I was kind of hoping you'd take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off at some point.... hehe...
This one is going to make a splash, I can tell...
If you're worried about going forward, then just remember that you can do this!
I traveled with a group of boys for so long that I forgot what it was like to be around other girls... tee hee!
I was starting to wonder if you'd take your ~clothing~ off next or not... Well, there's the answer!
I'm having lots of fun! I hope you feel the same way.
Think of it like... taking your clothes off to have a bath! Or to get changed for the night. Am I helping?

Oh... Okay...
What's a donut?
I... was expecting something more bird-like... not bat-like.
Oh! That's... not what I was expecting. Ahem.
Goodness, I've never seen anything like this! And this isn't Psynergy, is it?

Oh my... goodness! I've never seen a power like this before!
This... This isn't Psynergy, is it?
And here I thought you were going to reveal yourself to be an Adept, keeping your hair hidden and all that.
Clearly, I'm missing out on some kind of new trend with this kind of underwear, given that you and ~marker.opp_revealed_thong1~ are both wearing it.
Am I missing out on some new kind of underwear trend? Both you and ~marker.opp_revealed_thong1~ are wearing that kind of thing, after all...
Oh, my. What kind of undergarment are you wearing? It's revealing quite a bit... basically just a bit of string, isn't it?
My, my. What kind of undergarment is that? It's basically just a piece of string, isn't it?
Yeah, I'm really interested in things now. And you've helped make things interesting!
That took courage. I appreciate your effort, ~target~!
That's not a bad look for you! Hehe!
I can only hope that I can be as strong as you when I need to take something off.
I'm really getting the appeal of this game! Hehe!

Brock goes down...
Mia casts Revive!
We want to see what those muscles of yours look like without your ~clothing~ in the way!
O-Only fair, right? This is only fair.
Forgive me if I can't help but get a good look...
He's going to show a lot of skin if he takes ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off...!
He's really doing it? This should be nice.
And to think, we hardly know each other!
I am rather sorry for your injury, Dunban. I'm not sure if there are healing draughts that can fix damage that severe, but I could look into it.
You're a very handsome individual... hee hee...
Goodness, I just got goosebumps. I didn't know seeing a man's body would do that!
Tee hee! You're looking good, ~target~!
Looking good, ~target~!
You're very handsome, ~target~. Nice!
Oh, please, no thank you.
You may want to cover your eyes, Fizz!
How exciting. I've been waiting for this!
The anticipation is killing me...
Oh! It's time for this part already? So sudden!
I don't suppose you have anything else on underneath ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~?
This whole game is something else...
How generous of you, ~target~...
I-It's just a penis, nothing to be scared of...
Your friend was pretty eager to get out of your ~clothing~, right?
I think we already have a good idea of what we're about to see, hehe!
It took you a lot of courage to show yourself off, ~target~. So I won't say anything.
Is your little friend shy? Aw, poor thing.
If you need to do something to get yourself excited, then by all means.
Well, even if you're on the small side, maybe it's capable of doing big things.
Aw, it's such a cute little thing...
Aw, that's such a cute little guy. Is he shy?
It's not the size that matters, it's what you do with it. Or something.
Aw, your little friend is just adorable! Hehe...
Oh, it's rather... ahem, rather small, isn't it?
Do you need a minute to get it up? Or is that it?
Well, I'm sure you can make up for it in other ways. Tee hee!
You're on the small side, but that doesn't have to be a bad thing! I'm sure you know how to use your hands, right?
Mmm... Sorry, you were saying something?
Mercury, forgive me...
I-I... Ahem. It's very good. You must be very proud.

My--!
(I must keep my cool about this. I must!)
Feels good to get out of your ~clothing~, right?
Mmm... Not bad. Not bad.
I'm glad you were keen on doing this. My curiosity is dealt with, hee hee!
Well hello there!
Must feel good to get rid of your ~clothing~. Looks like it was a tight fit.
Mmm... Not bad. Not bad at all.
I'm glad you were keen on doing this. My curiosity is dealt with, hee hee!

O-Oh my! It's... terribly large, isn't it? H-How would that even fit inside a lady?
Well...
O-Oh my! It's... terribly large, isn't it? How did you even fit that thing inside your ~clothing~?

HOLY COW. Your penis is gigantic. GIGANTIC. Your penis is literally the biggest thing on Weyard. Your penis is bigger than a Roc. It is bigger than, like, a tree. A big ol' tree. Probably from Kolima forest. Lots of branches on your penis. You must wake up every morning and thank Mercury. You are truly blessed. Congrats.
Goodness. It's awfully big, but, that's kind of what I was hoping for.
Need someone to use a healing hand on that? It looks awfully swolen, and I do know how to handle someone with care.

You know, ~target~, I'm quite good with my hands. As a healer, I mean.
What did you think I meant? Hehe!
You should really put that thng away again.
Ugh. Put it away, please.
So there was nothing under your dress? My, my...
Goodness, your dress is just coming right off...!
You can do it. Don't worry!
Ah, she's really taking ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ off! She's doing it!
Why am I suddenly feeling worked up? it's probably nothing, but still...)

What the character says when a female character is about to remove the last piece of clothing covering their chest. For NPCs, this is a clothing element on the "upper" location, with the "important" type.

What the character says when a female character is about to remove the last piece of clothing covering their chest. For NPCs, this is a clothing element on the "upper" location, with the "important" type.

Huh... I really like how slim you are. Not something I was expecting to get excited for!
Nice and small, they would fit in anybody's hand!
Hmm... you could rather easily fit those in the palm of your hand, couldn't you?
They look great. Nice and perky. They're very pretty, too!
You know, for all the emphasis certain men place on the size of the chest... what really matters is how much confidence you have in yourself.
I-I don't know where this is coming from, but I almost want to find out how much more sensitive smaller ones can be.
Oh! You're so pretty! I'm a little bit jealous, you make it look easy.
A chest that would set many hearts aflame with passion!
Ah, what a nice view!
I'm sure you've gotten no shortage of attention, hehe!
It feels good to let the girls out, doesn't it?
You make it look so easy to look good. How do you do it?
You're awfully pretty, ~target~. I'm sure you knew that already, but it's true!
Oh! The shape is really good, and they look like they'd be a delight to hold...
I'm surprised you didn't have a brassiere or anything on under your ~clothing~. Won't they bounce around a lot when you're walking?
Goodness. Don't they bounce around a lot without any sort of support?
Goodness... How on Weyard do you deal with the back pain?
I can't even imagine trying to find clothes that fit. Not to mention the pain of it all. What I'm trying to say is, they're huge!
Oh my stars. They're rather full-sized, aren't they?
Goodness. They're pretty big... A little more so than I was expecting.
I'm actually relieved mine didn't grow to be as big. I-I'm quite happy with what I have.
Having a large chest is certainly a bragging point for ladies that aren't very demure.
I've only ever fondled my own breasts, so I am rather curious to know what those would feel like...
They look wonderful. So large, round , and soft...
Oh my...
Mmm...
Oh my... They're awfully big... {small}So... Hmm...
Goodness. They're rather big... You must feel blessed!
I can certainly see the appeal of a larger bosom. I'm not even jealous, I just want to... see it.
Wow... They bounced a little as well... That was almost hypnotic.
Oh my stars. They're even bigger than I thought!
Oh goodness. They're somehow even bigger than I thought they'd be!
Wow, your ~clothing~ was really putting in effort to keep them hidden!
Well, if you have the assets to show off, then by all means go ahead and show them off.
I-I have a strong feeling we're about to see just how well rounded ~target~ really is.
I know how nerve-wracking this must feel, but you can do it!
We aready left our dignity at the door, so to speak, so this is just the end result of that.
She's really going to do it. Be brave, ~target~!
Just a little bit more, and we'll be able to see everything!
Daring to~background.time~, aren't you, Aqua? Well, I think you look good with your socks still on.
Venus must have been particularly bright when you were born. You were blessed with an impressive derrire.
Someone was born when Venus was shining bright. You were blessed with a most impressive derrire.
(Be still, my heart.)
I-I... I'm staring, so sorry, I'll look away if you want!
I haven't seen many of these in my time. Even as a healer.
I'm suddenly really aware of what we're actually doing in this game! {small}Ahh..
As cute as the rest of you, hee hee...
... Not a bad view.
I don't know what to say. You're pretty in ways I cannot describe. Be proud of yourself, ~target~.
From one lady to another, I must say you look rather enticing... hehe...
It's been a while, so, have you put any thought into my question, Gloria?
Goodness, I know I only just asked you, but do you have an answer for my question, Gloria?
Looks like you're up, ~player~.
You've been rather quiet, haven't you, ~player~?
You're a little bit on the quiet side, aren't you, ~player~?
Maybe you need a bit of a confidence boost, ~player~? Well, here's something sincere...
You haven't said a word yet, have you, ~player~? You don't strike me as being the super shy type.
Gloria, I have a bit of an odd question for you. Sorry in advance if this is too personal.
Ah, ~player~ is out. Not a single word from them, and yet, they look ready to go already...
Oh, wow. We both had seven high? That's so unlucky for both of us!
This is your first loss, so don't take it too hard. Okay, ~target~? Why not tell us a little about yourself?
And now it's your turn, ~target~. This is only your first loss, so why don't you tell us a little about yourself?

I really haven't lost a single time yet, have I?
Truth be told, I was hoping it'd be me this time. The heat is getting to me...
You know what they say. When it rains, it pours.
I-It's the first loss of the game, but isn't ~target~ already showing off all the goods?
Already, ~target~? But the rest of us are still... well, we're still going strong.
Looks like ~target~ is the first one to lose. That said... I don't think ~target.ifMale(he|she)~ has much to lose in the first place...
And the first one to lose is... Oh, it's ~target~! Show us how it's done.
It seems that the first one to lose is... Aha, it's ~target~! Mind showing us how to get started?
And the first one to lose is... Oh, it's ~target~! Show us how it's done.
It seems that the first one to lose is... Aha, it's ~target~! Mind showing us how to get started?
Gosh, I haven't lost yet, have I? Not once in the minutes since we started.
I've never known someone with the power of Venus being able to do what you do. I met a young Jupiter adept who could sense people with the power of the mind.
Well, it's just a question of... You like women, right? The same way someone would like men.
Oh! Okay, then. So... how did you know you liked women as well? What did it feel like? What made you so sure?
Oh! You're really taking your ~clothing~ off right away? How bold!
I wish I was as bold as you are, ~target~. Pulling off your ~clothing~ so soon...
... Mari, that's a terrible idea. You'd end up hurting yourself!
Without a hint of hesitation, you took your ~clothing~ off...
Silent, stoic, a ~player.ifMale(man|lady)~ of action... reminds me of someone I know.
You have a cute smile, ~player~. It suits you very well!
Then again, would any of us really be playing this game if we were that shy?
Where I'm going with this is that I wanted to know if you could tell me... Uhm... Tell me when you knew you were like that.
Oh. So you just knew, one day, looking at a female friend? I see.
Even your glasses? Wow, you must be desperate to win!
Of course a fool like Aqua has to resort to cheating to get by... Hee hee!
Oh, Aqua. If only you didn't need to resort to obvious cheating to get by.
To be honest with you, I think we're all getting a little tired of this.
If you're going to play this slowly, I may as well lay on down and go to sleep.
I may as well lay down and go for a nap, if you're going to be playing this cautiously.
Please, no more of this. It's getting a little tiresome to see you take off things like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~.
If you're going to segment your clothes into as few things as possible... well, I can't really stop you. But it is an annoying habit.
The floor here is smooth enough, so don't sorry about your feet. That said... hm. {small}Maybe I should put a towel down if I...
The road here is so uncomfortable. I can hardly stand for it.
The floor here is smooth enough, so don't sorry about your feet!
Oh! I guess the Mercury-style undergarment is common elsewhere after all.
Oh! I guess the Mercury-clan style of undergarment is common elsewhere, too. Well, you can't see mine yet, but...
Oh! We had the same idea! Now I don't feel as bad for pulling the top down on my own garment.
I ... I don't understand a single thing that is going on here. Why is there a face of ~target~ on that metal box?

Oh! That explains why you seemed so nervous earlier.
Don't fret, ~target~. We accept you for who you are!
Feel free to use my body as... uhm... visual encouragement.
If you need someone to... get your rocks off... you can look at my body.
Enjoy yourself... You can look at... {small}me, if you want.
I hope you can enjoy yourself...
You're really enjoying that, huh, Yuno?
I hope she doesn't take too much out of you, Yuno... I don't know if I could heal you back to full strength.
When I came here-- I mean, when I arrived here, I didn't expect to see this much action from other people.
So that's how you do that...
You're really giving it to ~target.ifMale(him|her)~...
Don't mind me, you two...
Having a partner must make things easier.
... I'm not jealous!
I didn't really know that you could get help like that.
Oh! C-Careful, touching ~target.ifMale(him|her)~ there!
And to think, they say romance is dead.

state.text: Oh, Fizz! Welcome back. I guess I won't be lonely with you around.
Oh there you are, Fizz! Well, I guess I wont be lonely any more. Everyone, this is Fizz, a Mercury Djinni.

case.state: I-I didn't realize everyone would be fawning over you, ~player~...

Goodness, I didn't know you had that kind of interest in ~player~...
That was interesting. I didn't know you and ~player~ were that close...

Mmm... Keep pumping it, just like that.

Ohh... So good... I'm going to...
Yes... Yes! I'm--!!
I'm so... so... it's so good...!!
By Hermes, I'm so... close...! It's so good, I ...!
N-Nearly there... Please... Hnngh...
Ahh... Hahh... I'm nearly there...
I can't... I can't... I'm going to...
Ohh... Ohh...! It's so good... Ahh...
Mmm... Come on... I'm almost there!
I-It's so hot... even hotter than before...
It's so warm ~background.if.indoors(in|out)~ here... and I'm only getting hotter...
Ohh... I'm melting in this heat... but it's so good...
I feel so sticky... so warm and... so good...

I'm... Ah! Ah...!!
~Player!!~ Haaaaah...!!

Mm... I'm... Ah! Ah...!!
~Player~!! Haaaaah...!!

I'm... Ah! Ah...!!
Haaaaah...!!

Mm... I'm... Ah! Ah...!!
Haaaaah...!!
Hahh... Wow... That was good. I... Didn't intend to say your name, ~player~, but everyone else was doing it...
That... felt... incredible. Goodness... Hah... Everyone else said your name, ~player~, so you caught me doing it as well...
Hahh... Wow... That was good. I... I need a moment... to catch my breath...
That... felt... incredible. Goodness... Give me a moment... Hah...
Oh... my... that felt... incredible... I need a moment...
So... How's it going?
Hmm...
I feel a little silly, now...
Phew... I'm glad I don't have to worry about the game any more. Cards aren't exactly my strong suit.

Alright, that's finally over, and we can all leave this spooky forest.
Shall we go somewhere else, now? Please?
Skill issue + PP up + Hard Nut + Muramasa + Ragnarok.

Alright, that's finally over.
Should we... go somewhere else, now? Visit the bar, perhaps?
Mmm! I feel absolutely wonderful after that! Oh, is it time for us to pack up now?
Mmm! I feel absolutely blissful after that! Oh, is it time for us to gather our things?
Oh, it's time for us to pack up now, isn't it? This was a fun experience! I hope I can see you all again some time!
That was loads of fun! Let's do this again sometime. After packing things up and sorting out our clothes, where should we go next?
I should do that more often. I feel absolutely blissful!
That really lifted my spirits. I feel great!

state.text: Oh, Fizz! Welcome back. I guess I won't be lonely with you around.
Oh there you are, Fizz! Well, I guess I wont be lonely any more. Everyone, this is Fizz, a Mercury Djinni.

case.state: Wait... So... Do I just stand here and wait for everything to be over?
Disable mouth for custom poses that are for early stages only
